Move pafoap02 notes

  1. Disable any Openview alerts
  2. Shutdown the application on pafoap02 - Moon Do
  3. Disable any NFS exports / mounts on pafoap02 - Kapil
    pafoap02:/root>exportfs
/usr/sap/trans -sec=sys:krb5p:krb5i:krb5:dh,rw
  4. Shutdown the OS from console
    shutdown -F

    Once done power off the blade from Bladecentre Remote control.

  5. Move these LUNs to taprvio17
    /dev/rhdisk2 :EMC     :SYMMETRIX       :5772  :71648008   :35351040
/dev/rhdisk3 :EMC     :SYMMETRIX       :5772  :71BD7008   :141404160
/dev/rhdisk4 :EMC     :SYMMETRIX       :5772  :71!%`000   :141404160

    PVIDs are as follows 

    hdisk2          0001247ab64a115d                    datavg01        active
hdisk3          0002e82a95316b05                    rootvg          active
hdisk4          0002e82a538457bd                    altinst_rootvg
  6. Map these LUNs to the lpar - Kapil
  7. Boot the new pafoap02 on taprvio17
  8. Reconfigure network on pafoap02 IP configuration is here.
    en4: flags=1e080863,c0<UP,BROADCAST,NOTRAILERS,RUNNING,SIMPLEX,MULTICAST,GROUPRT,64BIT,CHECKSUM_OFFLOAD(ACTIVE),LARGESEND,CHAIN>
        inet 10.0.48.177 netmask 0xffffff00 broadcast 10.0.48.255
en5: flags=5e080863,c0<UP,BROADCAST,NOTRAILERS,RUNNING,SIMPLEX,MULTICAST,GROUPRT,64BIT,CHECKSUM_OFFLOAD(ACTIVE),PSEG,LARGESEND,CHAIN>
        inet 10.0.49.177 netmask 0xffffff00 broadcast 10.0.49.255
  9. Reboot the new OS and make sure network services are started up properly and all filesystems mounted appropriately.
  10. Enable NFS exports
    pafoap02:/root>exportfs
/usr/sap/trans -sec=sys:krb5p:krb5i:krb5:dh,rw
  11. Bring up the application and checkout - Moon Do.
  12. Update console database - Kapil
  13. Enable Openview alerts.
